mapper.insert: insert into tbl_r_img (r_img_id, file_name, file_size, file_content_type, file_upload_date, file_data, regdate, updatedate) values(#{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, current_timestamp, #{fileData}, sysdate, sysdate)

insert into tbl_review (review_id, r_img_id, email, pos, company, title, content, comm_cnt, like_cnt, view_cnt, regdate, updatedate, temp) values(review_sq.nextval, #{fileId}, 'e@naver.com', #{pos}, #{company}, #{title}, #{content}, #{commCnt}, #{likeCnt}, #{viewCnt}, sysdate, sysdate, '1')

insert into tbl_review (review_id, r_img_id, email, pos, company, title, content, comm_cnt, like_cnt, view_cnt, regdate, updatedate, temp) values(review_sq.nextval, #{fileId}, #{email}, #{pos}, #{company}, #{title}, #{content}, #{commCnt}, #{likeCnt}, #{viewCnt}, sysdate, sysdate, '0')
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_review where temp=0

select m.name, r.review_id as "reviewId", r.r_img_id as "fileId", r.email, r.pos, r.company, r.title, r.content, r.comm_cnt as "commCnt", r.like_cnt as "likeCnt", r.view_cnt as "viewCnt", r.regdate, r.updatedate, r.temp from ((select row_number() over (order by review_id desc) num, A.* from tbl_review A order by review_id desc)) z, tbl_review r, tbl_member m where r.temp=0 and z.num between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+10 and r.email=m.email and r.review_id=z.review_id
select name from tbl_member where email = #{email}

select m.name, r.review_id as "reviewId", r.r_img_id as "fileId", r.email, r.pos, r.company, r.title, r.content, r.comm_cnt as "commCnt", r.like_cnt as "likeCnt", r.view_cnt as "viewCnt", r.regdate, r.updatedate, r.temp from tbl_review r, tbl_member m where review_id=#{reviewId} and r.email=m.email

select r_img_id as "fileId", file_name as "fileName", file_size as "fileSize", file_content_type as "fileContentType", file_upload_date as "fileUploadDate", file_data as "fileData", regdate as "regdate", updatedate as "updatedate" from tbl_r_img where r_img_id=#{fileId}

select i.pf_img_id as "fileId", i.file_name as "fileName", i.file_size as "fileSize", i.file_content_type as "fileContentType", i.file_upload_date as "fileUploadDate", i.file_data as "fileData", i.regdate as "regdate", i.updatedate as "updatedate" from tbl_member m, tbl_profile p, tbl_pf_img i where email=#{email} and m.pf_id=p.pf_id and p.pf_img_id=i.pf_img_id
mapper.update: update tbl_review set view_cnt=view_cnt+1 where review_id=#{reviewId}
